about_the_game:
With the classic arcade game to revisit the retro gameplay, players use the up and down, left and right movement, through the magic sword painting cut lines to liberate the painting, to achieve the required completion level to pass the level. Each of the eight leaders in the level has its own characteristics and will release small monsters to obstruct the player. However, there are many special props in the process, which can help players to pass the level more smoothly after obtaining them.

The Demon King “Sod” rules the Demon Kingdom. One day, the demon world was attacked by an unknown force, which almost occupied the whole continent.

Through an ancient prophecy, the Demon King must rescue the girls of different races who are imprisoned in various places, and after mingling with the magic power of these girls, he can defeat this force and restore the peace of the Demon Continent.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developer indicated the following product content.

This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or for viewing in the workplace: nudity or pornography, general adult-oriented content.

All characters in this work are 18 years of age or older.

detailed_description:
With the classic arcade game to revisit the retro gameplay, players use the up and down, left and right movement, through the magic sword painting cut lines to liberate the painting, to achieve the required completion level to pass the level. Each of the eight leaders in the level has its own characteristics and will release small monsters to obstruct the player. However, there are many special props in the process, which can help players to pass the level more smoothly after obtaining them.

The Demon King “Sod” rules the Demon Kingdom. One day, the demon world was attacked by an unknown force, which almost occupied the whole continent.

Through an ancient prophecy, the Demon King must rescue the girls of different races who are imprisoned in various places, and after mingling with the magic power of these girls, he can defeat this force and restore the peace of the Demon Continent.
name: Hell Savior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN 10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Download and play the demo to ensure compatibility and performance.

agcom.descriptors: Questo gioco ha temi per adulti, linguaggio e personaggi di fantasia raffigurati in situazioni sessuali. Tutti i personaggi raffigurati hanno più di 18 anni.

bbfc.descriptors: This game has adult themes, language, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

cero.descriptors: このゲームには、アダルトなテーマ、言語、性的な状況で描かれた架空のキャラクターがあります。描かれているキャラクターはすべて18歳以上です。

crl.descriptors: В этой игре есть взрослые темы, язык и вымышленные персонажи, изображенные в сексуальных ситуациях. Все изображенные персонажи старше 18 лет.

csrr.descriptors: 這款遊戲有成人主題，語言，和虛構的人物描繪的性情。所有描寫的人物都在18歲以上。

short_description: Classic arcade game 'Tian Can Bian' is reborn with a retro twist, swiftly opening up the mysterious realm hidden in the silhouettes, and bringing passionate returns by rescuing various races of the different world...
